meta.title: 血圧 - イギリスNo.1血圧アプリ | Feeltracker
meta.description: イギリスで最も人気の血圧記録アプリ。カメラスキャンAI技術で血圧を簡単に記録。収縮期血圧、拡張期血圧、脈拍、平均動脈圧を管理。Apple Healthと同期、医師向けレポートの作成、AIインサイトでパターンを発見。iPhone、iPad、Macに対応。
meta.keywords: 血圧,心拍数,モニター,オムロン,記録,チェック,ログ,血圧計,日記,高血圧,マイクロライフ,ボイラー
meta.ogTitle: 血圧 | イギリスNo.1アプリ | Feeltracker
meta.ogDescription: イギリスNo.1の血圧アプリ。カメラスキャンAI、Apple Health同期、AIインサイトで血圧を管理。医師と共有できるレポートを作成。
meta.twitterDescription: イギリスNo.1の血圧アプリ。カメラスキャンAI、Apple Health同期、AIインサイトで記録・管理。

data.structuredDataHtml:
<script type="application/ld+json">
    {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",
      "@type": "MobileApplication",
      "name": "血圧",
      "applicationCategory": "HealthApplication",
      "applicationSubCategory": "血圧モニター",
      "operatingSystem": "iOS 16.0 or later",
      "description": "イギリスで最も人気の血圧記録アプリ。AIインサイトを活用して、収縮期・拡張期血圧、心拍数、平均動脈圧（MAP）を管理。モニター画面から自動で数値を読み取るカメラスキャンAI、Apple Health連携、医療機関との共有機能を搭載。",
      "offers": {
        "@type": "Offer",
        "price": "0",
        "priceCurrency": "USD"
      },
      "aggregateRating": {
        "@type": "AggregateRating",
        "ratingValue": "4.8",
        "ratingCount": 16702,
        "bestRating": "5",
        "worstRating": "1"
      },
      "author": {
        "@type": "Organization",
        "name": "Custom Arts"
      },
      "featureList": [
        "カメラスキャンAIによる自動読み取り",
        "Apple Health双方向同期",
        "AI搭載パターン検出",
        "PDF・Excelへのエクスポート",
        "平均動脈圧の計算",
        "OMRON、マイクロライフ、ボイラーのモニターに対応",
        "1日に複数回の記録が可能",
        "服薬記録",
        "色分けカレンダー表示",
        "iCloudバックアップと同期",
        "33言語対応"
      ],
      "screenshot": "https://feeltracker.com/images/screenshots/bpt-1.png",
      "softwareVersion": "Latest",
      "award": "イギリスApp Store血圧記録アプリNo.1",
      "inLanguage": ["en", "es", "fr", "de", "it", "nl", "pt", "sv", "no", "da", "fi", "pl", "ru", "uk", "cs", "sk", "ro", "hr", "hu", "ar", "he", "zh", "ja", "ko", "th", "vi", "id", "el", "tr", "ca"],
      "countriesSupported": ["United Kingdom", "United States", "Canada", "Australia", "Germany", "France", "Spain", "Italy", "Japan", "Worldwide"],
      "datePublished": "2015",
      "downloadUrl": "https://apps.apple.com/app/id794542324",
      "installUrl": "https://apps.apple.com/app/id794542324",

        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Blood pressure monitoring"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Wow....",
          "reviewBody": "I've used other apps before, and I will tell you the AI feedback sets this app apart from all the rest. Freaking love this thing. The AI feedback does it all for me. Tells me what I want to keep an eye out for, always recommends consulting my doctor on anything I'm concerned about. The creators nailed it seriously!!!"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "MelGreer"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Best Blood Pressure App Experience",
          "reviewBody": "I've found the best blood pressure app I've ever tried. It not only lets me send results to my doctor, but people seem work tirelessly to keep the app running smoothly. They're constantly updating and improving it, which is awesome."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Wiesiu33"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Very good app",
          "reviewBody": "My doctor wants me to record my BP daily. This app allows me to record my info and records it in a very nicely designed format. Great app."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "frdfranz"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Really Cool App",
          "reviewBody": "Just a few nights ago I started keeping a record of my blood pressure this app is really cool. I would recommend this app in a heartbeat."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Tippy's Dad"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Fantastic App",
          "reviewBody": "Such a great app. It keeps track of my blood pressure. You won't go wrong here!"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "AzChica"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Love this app",
          "reviewBody": "Love this app! I like how easy it is to use and I open it up for my Dr. to have a look at. Very convenient!"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Memdave"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "BP Tracker",
          "reviewBody": "Simple and complete."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "H. Wiggins"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Detailed useful app",
          "reviewBody": "Best app yet!! Better than American Heart Association. You can log more than one reading a day and with its appropriate time. Also it has space for notes. The best thing you can create reports into a pdf for your doctors visit."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "RWW@Texas"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Blood pressure tracker",
          "reviewBody": "I installed this to track problems I was having for very low blood pressure issues. By tracking with this instead of my sloppy hand writing I was able to give my Dr more information and found the problem."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Tata4now2"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Best blood pressure tracker I have found",
          "reviewBody": "This app just works for quick easy data entry and overview. It's well designed and built. In addition, the developer is super responsive and the app just keeps getting better."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Vskin8"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Great tracking",
          "reviewBody": "This is very good to show my doctor during visits. Trying to get the exact combination of meds to control my pressure better."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "doug888"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Easy to use!",
          "reviewBody": "I was looking for an app specifically for Blood Pressure without all the other measurements required. This app is perfect for that. It works extremely well and customer support responds promptly to questions."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "mharrell34"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Effective and FREE",
          "reviewBody": "This app does what it says and the free version is more than adequate to record my daily BP readings. Great work, developers!"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Dartgirl64"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Blood pressure",
          "reviewBody": "This is exactly what I have been looking for. I just want to keep a calendar and time so that when and if I go to dr my readings are logged in."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "moosenut245"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Latest update",
          "reviewBody": "I've been using this app for about six months now has exceeded my expectations. The app has the ability to allow you to put your own information in and it automatically syncs over to Apple Health, no fuss no muss. Great App!!"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "nuttk"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Great App for blood pressure monitoring and tracking.",
          "reviewBody": "I started using this blood pressure logging/tracking app February, 2023. I'm very pleased with how basic and simple it is to use."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Clearwater Guy"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Great App",
          "reviewBody": "Very easy to use"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Jesdavmat"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "The Best!",
          "reviewBody": "This app works great. Just what I needed. It is very easy to use. I recommend it"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Rgobell"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Great App!",
          "reviewBody": "Very easy to use and provides a great log to monitor your health."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "deblynnehag"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Blood pressure",
          "reviewBody": "I really like this app. It will be an easy way for me to record my blood pressure to show my doctor without trying to keep up with paper notes."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "7"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Most useful app I've used",
          "reviewBody": "Very good for quick and easy records"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Ele"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Excellent App",
          "reviewBody": "This Blood Pressure/Heart Rate app is easy to use and syncs well with the Apple Health app. The note area is very useful and a convenient way to organize and present information to your doctor. Fully recommend."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "EmoRon1069"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Easy!!!",
          "reviewBody": "It's free and easy. Does the basics like avg and mean arterial pressure. Thank you developers!!"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Duro300"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Amazing app",
          "reviewBody": "Easy to use and extremely helpful to keep records. Saves time and keeps things organized. Takes seconds to update data."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Jfmatt2"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Best app ever!",
          "reviewBody": "This is just a great app. Easy to use and a great place to store all of your blood pressure records all in one place."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "It'sdaone"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Love it",
          "reviewBody": "This makes things so easy and you also can make notes. My doctor likes what I show him"
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "CHT549"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Great app",
          "reviewBody": "I found this app and started recording everything. You can record notes on each entry, it is great for reports you can even email a pdf file to your doctor so they can keep up with it. I am very happy with it."
        },
        {
          "@type": "Review",
          "author": {"@type": "Person", "name": "Rocky 48"},
          "reviewRating": {"@type": "Rating", "ratingValue": "5", "bestRating": "5"},
          "name": "Excellent",
          "reviewBody": "This is the best blood pressure recording app I could find. The most important feature to me is that it syncs my iPhone and iPad quickly, accurately, and automatically, just using iCloud. No subscription nonsense. I love it."
        }
      ]
    }
    </script>
    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",
      "@type": "FAQPage",
      "mainEntity": [
        {
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "最も優れた血圧記録アプリは何ですか？",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "血圧アプリはイギリスでNo.1の血圧記録アプリです。AIインサイト、モニター画面から自動で数値を読み取るカメラスキャンAI技術（OMRON、マイクロライフ、ボイラー対応）、Apple Health連携、医師との共有機能を搭載。収縮期・拡張期血圧、心拍数、平均動脈圧（MAP）の記録に対応しています。"
          }
        },
        {
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "カメラスキャンAIはどのように機能しますか？",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "カメラスキャンAIは高度な光学文字認識（OCR）技術を使用して、血圧計のデジタル表示から血圧値を自動的に読み取ります。iPhoneまたはiPadのカメラを収縮期、拡張期、脈拍が表示された画面に向けるだけで、アプリが自動的に数値を入力します。手入力の誤りをなくし、記録を高速化します。OMRON、マイクロライフ、ボイラーなど、ほとんどのデジタル血圧計に対応しています。"
          }
        },
        {
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "正常な血圧値はどのくらいですか？",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "医学的ガイドラインによると、正常な血圧は一般的に120/80 mmHg未満です。収縮期が120〜129で拡張期が80未満の場合は正常高値とされます。130/80以上の値は高血圧を示す可能性があります。ただし、目標範囲は年齢や健康状態によって異なるため、個別のアドバイスについては医師にご相談ください。"
          }
        },
        {
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "血圧データを医師と共有できますか？",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "はい、血圧アプリではPDFやExcel形式で包括的なレポートをエクスポートできます。統計サマリー、トレンドチャート、服薬記録、メモなど、医療機関が必要とする情報がすべて1つのドキュメントにまとまっています。メールなどで簡単に共有できます。"
          }
        },
        {
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "Apple Healthと連携できますか？",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "はい、血圧アプリはApple Healthとの双方向連携に対応しています。Apple Healthから過去の血圧データをインポートでき、新しい記録はHealthKitに自動保存されます。すべてのAppleデバイスで包括的な健康管理が可能です。"
          }
        },
        {
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "血圧モニタリングにおけるMAPとは何ですか？",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "MAP（平均動脈圧）は、1回の心拍サイクル中の動脈内の平均血圧を表す計算値です。計算式は：MAP =（2 × 拡張期 + 収縮期）÷ 3です。一部の医師はMAPを心血管リスクや臓器灌流の評価に活用しています。血圧アプリは各記録ごとにMAPを自動計算します。"
          }
        },
        {
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "血圧データのプライバシーは守られますか？",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "はい、血圧データはデバイス上とプライベートなiCloudアカウントに暗号化されて保存されます。データが外部サーバーを経由することはなく、開発者がお客様の健康情報を閲覧することはできません。AppleのメモやPhotosアプリと同等のセキュリティを備えており、GDPRに完全準拠しています。"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
    </script>

hero.imageAlt: 血圧アプリのアイコン
hero.title: 血圧
hero.privacy: 広告なし・トラッキングなし・プライバシー第一
hero.subtitle: 血圧を記録・理解するための最もスマートな方法。カメラスキャンAIで数値を読み取り、Apple Healthと同期し、AIインサイトで心血管の健康状態を把握しましょう。
hero.ctaAlt: App Storeで血圧をダウンロード
hero.platformInfo:
基本無料・オプションのプレミアム機能あり
iPhone、iPad、Mac対応 • iOS 16.0以降

screenshots.title: Feeltracker血圧アプリの使用イメージ

items.alt: 血圧スクリーンショット1
血圧スクリーンショット2
血圧スクリーンショット3

features.title: 血圧管理のための強力な機能

items.title: カメラスキャンAI
items.description: 血圧計の画面にカメラを向けるだけで、収縮期、拡張期、脈拍の値を自動的に読み取って記録。手入力は不要です。

items.title: 包括的な記録
items.description: 収縮期・拡張期血圧、心拍数/脈拍、平均動脈圧（MAP）を管理。1日に複数回の記録で、日中の変動を把握できます。

items.title: Apple Health連携
items.description: Apple Healthとシームレスに同期。過去の血圧データをインポートし、新しい記録をHealthKitに自動保存して包括的な健康管理を実現。

items.title: AIインサイト
items.description: インテリジェントなパターン検出で血圧に影響する要因を発見。トリガー、生活習慣要因、経時的なトレンドについて個別のインサイトを取得。

items.title: 医師向けレポート
items.description: 血圧の記録履歴をPDFまたはExcelレポートとしてエクスポート。医療機関が確認しやすい形式で包括的なデータを共有できます。

items.title: ビジュアルチャートとトレンド
items.description: 美しいチャートで血圧のトレンドを一目で確認。日別、週別、月別、またはカスタム期間でパターンを把握できます。

howItWorks.title: 血圧アプリの使い方
howItWorks.subtitle: 効果的な血圧管理のために設計された包括的なシステム

steps.title: 1. 数値を記録する
steps.content:
**カメラスキャンAI：** 血圧計のディスプレイにカメラを向けるだけで、AIが収縮期、拡張期、脈拍の値を自動的に読み取ります。入力不要 - [OMRON](https://geni.us/B9RB)、マイクロライフ、ボイラーなど、ほとんどのデジタル血圧計の数値を直接読み取ります。

**手動入力：** 直接入力したい場合も、簡単な操作で素早く記録できます。数秒で1回分の記録が完了します。

**詳細なメモ：** 食事内容、服薬状況、運動、ストレスレベル、睡眠の質など、血圧に影響する可能性のある要因を詳しくメモできます。写真の添付やカスタムラベルでのタグ付けも可能で、後から簡単に検索できます。

steps.title: 2. パターンを追跡する
steps.content:
**カレンダー表示：** 直感的なカレンダーレイアウトですべての記録を確認。各日の測定値が医学的ガイドラインに基づいて正常・正常高値・高血圧の色分けで表示されます。

**自動統計：** 日別、週別、月別の平均値を即座に計算。最低値・最高値、標準偏差、経時的なトレンドを計算なしで確認できます。

**ビジュアルチャート：** 美しいグラフで日単位、週単位、月単位、またはカスタム期間の血圧トレンドを表示。パターンを一目で把握し、健康目標への進捗を確認できます。

steps.title: 3. AIインサイトを取得する
steps.content:
**パターン検出：** AIが記録とメモを分析し、相関関係を特定します。どの活動、食事、状況が血圧を上昇・低下させるかを発見できます。

**パーソナライズされた提案：** データに基づいた具体的なインサイトを取得。AIが「仕事のストレスについてメモした日は血圧が高い傾向にあります」や「朝の運動をした日は数値が低くなっています」といったパターンに気づくことがあります。

**データとの対話：** 「先月の夕方の平均血圧は？」や「薬を服用した後の記録を表示して」など、自然な言葉で質問できます。AIが文脈を理解し、即座に回答します。

steps.title: 4. 医師と共有する
steps.content:
**プロフェッショナルレポート：** 医療レビュー用にフォーマットされた包括的なPDFまたはExcelレポートをエクスポート。統計サマリー、トレンドチャート、服薬記録、メモなど、医師が必要とする情報がすべて1つのドキュメントにまとまっています。

**Apple Health連携：** すべての記録をApple Healthに自動同期。他のアプリやデバイスから過去のデータをインポート。血圧データが健康管理の全体像とつながります。

**クラウドバックアップ：** すべてのデータがプライベートなiCloudアカウントに自動バックアップ。デバイスを変更してもシームレスに移行でき、血圧の記録履歴すべてが暗号化された状態で安全に保管されます。

languages.title: 33言語に対応
languages.text: 血圧アプリは以下の言語に完全対応しています：英語、スペイン語（Español）、フランス語（Français）、カナダフランス語、ドイツ語（Deutsch）、イタリア語（Italiano）、オランダ語（Nederlands）、ブラジルポルトガル語（Português）、ポルトガルポルトガル語、スウェーデン語（Svenska）、ノルウェー語（Norsk）、デンマーク語（Dansk）、フィンランド語（Suomi）、ポーランド語（Polski）、ロシア語（Русский）、ウクライナ語（Українська）、チェコ語（Čeština）、スロバキア語（Slovenčina）、ルーマニア語（Română）、クロアチア語（Hrvatski）、ハンガリー語（Magyar）、アラビア語（العربية）、ヘブライ語（עברית）、簡体字中国語（简体中文）、繁体字中国語（繁體中文）、日本語（日本語）、韓国語（한국어）、タイ語（ไทย）、ベトナム語（Tiếng Việt）、インドネシア語（Bahasa Indonesia）、ギリシャ語（Ελληνικά）、トルコ語（Türkçe）、カタルーニャ語（Català）。

items.question: 正常な血圧値はどのくらいですか？
items.answer: 医学的ガイドラインによると、正常な血圧は一般的に120/80 mmHg未満です。収縮期が120〜129で拡張期が80未満の場合は正常高値とされます。130/80以上の値は高血圧を示す可能性があります。ただし、目標範囲は年齢や健康状態によって異なるため、個別のアドバイスについては医師にご相談ください。

items.question: カメラスキャンAIはどのように機能しますか？
items.answer: iPhoneまたはiPadのカメラを血圧計のデジタル表示に向けるだけです。アプリはAI搭載のカメラ認識技術を使用して数値を自動的に読み取り、収縮期、拡張期、脈拍の欄に入力します。手入力の誤りをなくし、記録を高速化します。[こちらで血圧計を入手できます](https://geni.us/B9RB)。

items.question: MAPとは何ですか？記録すべきですか？
items.answer: MAP（平均動脈圧）は、1回の心拍サイクル中の動脈内の平均血圧を表す計算値です。計算式は：MAP =（2 × 拡張期 + 収縮期）÷ 3です。一部の医師はMAPを心血管リスクの評価に活用しています。アプリは各記録ごとにMAPを自動計算します。

items.question: 過去の血圧データをインポートできますか？
items.answer: はい！Apple Healthで血圧を記録していた場合、ワンタップですべての過去データをアプリにインポートできます。また、他のソースからのデータがある場合は、CSV/Excelファイルからのインポートにも対応しています。

items.question: どのくらいの頻度で血圧を測定すべきですか？
items.answer: 健康状態や医師の推奨によって異なります。毎日（朝と夕方が多い）測定する方もいれば、週1回の方もいます。アプリでは医療機関が推奨する頻度で簡単に記録でき、一貫したスケジュールを維持するためのリマインダーも設定できます。

items.question: 血圧データのプライバシーは守られますか？
items.answer: もちろんです。血圧データはデバイス上とプライベートなiCloudアカウントに暗号化されて保存されます。データが当社のサーバーを経由することはなく、お客様の健康情報を閲覧することはできません。AppleのメモやPhotosアプリと同等のセキュリティです。

items.question: 家族の血圧も記録できますか？
items.answer: アプリは個人利用向けに設計されており、個人のiCloudアカウントと同期します。複数のご家族の記録を管理する場合は、各自のデバイスでそれぞれのApple IDを使用してアプリをご利用ください。

items.question: 広告やトラッキングはありますか？
items.answer:
**いいえ。** アプリからすべての広告を完全に排除しています。他のアプリやウェブサイトにわたってお客様を追跡することはなく、データを広告主に販売することもありません。

データはiCloud経由で同期されます - Apple NotesやPhotosと同じ仕組みです。そのため、メールアドレスや名前などの個人情報を収集する必要がありません。血圧データはお使いのデバイスとiCloudアカウントに保存され、無料版でもプレミアム版でも完全にプライベートです。

items.question: サブスクリプションは必要ですか？
items.answer: アプリは完全無料でダウンロード・利用できます。すべての基本的な記録機能はサブスクリプションなしで動作します。プレミアムサブスクリプションでは、高度なAI機能、無制限のエクスポート、カスタマイズ強化が利用可能になります。無料トライアル期間中にすべてのプレミアム機能をお試しいただけます。

reviews.title: ユーザーの声
reviews.subtitle: App Storeの実際のレビュー

items.title: Wow....
items.content: I've used other apps before, and I will tell you the AI feedback sets this app apart from all the rest. Freaking love this thing. Always kind of felt like I was flying in the dark most the time before this. I would try and google what the variations in my pressures could be, and what to watch for. The AI feedback does it all for me. Tells me what I want to keep an eye out for, always recommends consulting my doctor on anything I'm concerned about, but provides me a fundamental information of what the changes could be. Also even incorporates the one word notes I write about what was happening at the time I took the reading. Like stressed, tired, rested, etc. Yes amazing thorough feedback of possibilities, but always cautious to not take the place of our own responsibly to see a doctor, just terrific information you can actually take with you to show your doc if for any reason your concerns cause you to consult one. The creators nailed it seriously!!! Very appreciative.
items.author: Blood pressure monitoring

items.title: Best Blood Pressure App Experience
items.content: I've found the best blood pressure app I've ever tried. It not only lets me send results to my doctor, but people seem work tirelessly to keep the app running smoothly. They're constantly updating and improving it, which is awesome. Honestly, it's the best subscription I've got on my phone right now.
items.author: MelGreer

items.title: Very good app
items.content: My doctor wants me to record my BP daily. This app allows me to record my info and records it in a very nicely designed format. Great app.
items.author: Wiesiu33

items.title: Really Cool App
items.content: Just a few nights ago I started keeping a record of my blood pressure this app is really cool. It is funny how this app just popped up on my phone today. I would recommend this app in a heartbeat.
items.author: frdfranz

items.title: Fantastic App
items.content: Such a great app. It keeps track of my blood pressure. You won't go wrong here!
items.author: Tippy's Dad

items.title: ❤️
items.content: Love this app!❤️I like how easy it is to use and I open it up for my Dr. to have a look at. Very convenient!
items.author: AzChica😎🌵

items.content: Simple and complete.

items.title: Excelente
items.content: Muy completa
items.author: Tamboril1957

items.title: Detailed useful app
items.content: Best app yet!! Better than American Heart Association. You can log more than one reading a day and with it's appropriate time. Also it has space for notes. In my case when my blood pressure goes down I can write a note of what I was doing. The best think you can create reports into a pdf for your doctors visit.
items.author: H. Wiggins

items.title: Blood pressure tracker
items.content: I installed this to track problems I was having for very low blood pressure issues. By tracking with this instead of my 'sloppy' hand writing I was able to give my Dr more information and found the problem. And a wow! I had a question about the app which I sent an email for not really expecting an answer, But within 3 hours they responded with a very satisfactory answer, so High 5's to them for customer service.
items.author: RWW@Texas

items.title: Best blood pressure tracker I have found
items.content: This app just works for quick easy data entry and overview. It's well designed and built. In addition, the developer is *super* responsive and the app - although already really good - just keeps getting better.
items.author: Tata4now2

items.title: Great tracking
items.content: This is very good to show my doctor during visits. Trying to get the exact combination of meds to control my pressure better.
items.author: Vskin8

items.title: Easy to use!
items.content: I was looking for an app specifically for Blood Pressure without all the other measurements required. This app is perfect for that. It works extremely well and customer support response promptly to questions.
items.author: doug888

items.title: Effective and FREE
items.content: This app does what it says and the free version is more than adequate to recode my daily BP readings. Great work, developers!
items.author: mharrell34

items.title: Blood pressure
items.content: This is exactly wat I have been looking for. Every other charges too much, it's like paying for a dr visit. I just want to keep a calendar nd time so that when and if I go to dr. My reading are logged in. 9.99 a year is awesome
items.author: Dartgirl64

items.title: Latest update
items.content: I've been using this app for about six months now has exceeded my expectations. When I first started using it, I sent in a question to ask if it would update Apple health automatically and they said that it would be one of the things they would be looking at. As of this date, they've already made this update and it is working absolutely wonderful. The app is so simple to use and you're not have to hassle with any machine. With Omron I was always fighting to see if it would sync with Apple health, and the people that looked after the apps didn't seem to know what they were doing. This app has the ability to allow you to put your own information in and it automatically sync over to Apple health, no fuss no muss. Great App!!
items.author: moosenut245

items.title: Great App for blood pressure monitoring and tracking.
items.content: I started using this blood pressure logging/tracking app February, 2023. I'm very pleased with how basic and simple it is to use. Currently, I'm not likely using this app to its fullest potential, but am intending to dive deeper as I get better at logging all aspects of my health, including blood pressure regulation. Thank You Blood Pressure Monitor Tracker

Also did I tell you it was not expensive, I love it.
